articles.title: 63% of Albertans don’t believe public education system is ‘strong and healthy’: poll
articles.description: Nearly two-thirds of Albertans (63 per cent) disagree that the province’s public education system is “strong and healthy,” according to new polling data. articles.title: Canada knocks off undefeated Sweden in women’s round-robin curling
articles.description: Canada’s Team Rachel Homan is starting to roll at the 2026 Olympics.
